action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a tiefling or any Medium-sized devil. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus.name: Heated Body
entries: The dragon emits fire from its body. A creature that touches the dragon or hits it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it and the Heated Body is active takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. The Heated Body remains until the dragon dies or until it dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another wyvern corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Vengeful Strikes
entries: If the target hit by the revenant's melee attack is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) weapon damage.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The revenant makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Stinger. While flying, it can use its Claws in place of one other attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

monster.name: Wraith Warlock

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

trait.name: Whispering Aura
entries: At the start of each of the wraith's turns, each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, provided that the wraith isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Create Specter
entries: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

action.name: Howling Void
entries: The wraith opens a momentary extraplanar rift within 60 feet of it. The rift is a scream-filled, 20-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of the wraith until the end of the wraith's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition frightened}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wraith casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):

monster.name: Wraith Shadow Priest

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}25 ({@damage 5d8 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Create Specter
entries: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

action.name: Shadowy Embrace {@recharge 5}
entries: Shadowy tendrils stream forth from the wraith. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

action.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the wraith can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wraith casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):

monster.name: Wraith Necromancer

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Create Specter
entries: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

bonus.name: Command Undead
entries: The wraith targets one undead ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the giant, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or move up to half its speed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wraith casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):

monster.name: Wraith Archmage

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The wraith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the wraith casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The wraith has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Create Specter
entries: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wraith casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: {@i *The wraith casts this spell on itself before combat.}

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wortling has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wortling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wortling makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition incapacitated}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Wood Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 50 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Rooted
entries: The golem has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would pull, push, or knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two Slam attacks and uses Entangling Briars, if available.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Entangling Briars {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Grasping prickly shrubs and thorny vines sprout underneath each target. Each target must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the entangling briars for 1 minute. While {@condition restrained}, a creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 15} Strength check, escaping from the briars on a success. The briars can also be destroyed to end the effect. The entangling briars has AC 10, 15 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree stump.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The wolf-in-sheep's-clothing can mimic any sound it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Rooted
entries: The wolf-in-sheep's-clothing has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would pull, push, or knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wolf-in-sheep's-clothing makes two Root Tendril attacks. If it is grappling with a creature, it can also use its Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target it is grappling with. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

action.name: Root Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage and if the target is Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and pulled 5 feet toward the wolf-in-sheep'sclothing. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing can automatically hit the target with its root tendril. The wolf-in-sheep's-clothing has seven root tendrils, each of which can grapple only one target.

Each root tendril can be attacked (AC 11; 15 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the wolf-in-sheep's-clothing, which can grow a replacement tendril after 24 hours.

action.name: Create Lure
entries: The wolf-in-sheep's-clothing extends an organ from the top of its body and alters the shape and appearance of this organ to that of a Small or smaller creature that it has eaten. This organ or "lure," can't move from its position. However, the wolf-in-sheep'sclothing can manipulate the lure to make it look alive, as if it is breathing, nodding, or waving. The lure's disguise isn't perfect and will not hold up to physical inspection (glassy eyes, texture of skin feels rubbery, etc.)

A creature can discern if the lure is real by using its action to inspect it and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check. The creature must be within at least 15 feet of the lure to inspect it.

monster.name: Winter Eladrin, Elder

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sorrowful Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the eladrin for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The {@condition charmed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the eladrin casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks. The eladrin can cast one spell in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d10}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Freezing Smite (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action when the eladrin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it deals an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage and if the target isn't immune to cold, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's speed its speed is halved, it can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The effects last until the start of the eladrin's next turn.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: The eladrin teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Frigid Rebuke
entries: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 60 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendaryHeader: The eladrin gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The eladrin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The eladrin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The eladrin makes a Longsword or Longbow attack.

legendary.name: Gust of Wind
entries: The eladrin casts gust of wind.

monster.name: Warlock of the Undead
languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Form of Dread (3/Day)
entries: The warlock transforms into its Form of Dread which lasts for 1 minute. Until the Form of Dread ends, the warlock gains the following benefits:

items: It gains 20 temporary hit points.

Once during each of its turns, when the warlock hits a creature with an attack, the warlock can force it to make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, and if the saving throw fails, the target is {@condition frightened} of the warlock until the end of the warlock's next turn.
It is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and to necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warlock casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):

monster.name: Warlock of the Great Old One, Legendary

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the warlock fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Whispering Aura
entries: At the start of each of the warlock's turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the warlock casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The warlock has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warlock casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The warlock moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Dagger
entries: The warlock attacks with its Dagger.

legendary.name: Eldritch Blast (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The warlock casts {@spell eldritch blast}.

legendary.name: Mouth of Madness (Costs 1-3 Actions)
entries: The warlock utters an unworldly phrase and targets up to 3 creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the warlock, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward a creature of the warlock's choice that it can see and make one melee weapon attack against it, if it is within range. It costs 1 legendary action per target.

_monsterFluff.name: Warlock of the Great Old One, Legendary

monster.name: Warlock of the Fiend, Legendary

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the warlock fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
entries: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the warlock casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The warlock has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Summon Fiend (1/Day)
entries: The warlock summons a {@creature barbed devil}, {@creature barlgura}, or {@creature mezzoloth}. A summoned fiend appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the warlock and acts as an ally of the warlock. It remains for an hour, until it or the warlock dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warlock casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The warlock moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Quarterstaff
entries: The warlock attacks with its Quarterstaff.

legendary.name: Diabolical Presence
entries: The warlock targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the warlock, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} (warlock's choice) for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to warlock's Diabolical Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Eldritch Blast (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The warlock casts {@spell eldritch blast}.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unerring Assay
entries: The archon can unerringly identify the alignment of any creature it can see within 60 feet of it. Masking one's alignment, such as the use of a ring of mind shielding, will not deter the archon's unerring assay.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warden archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monster.name: Vampire Spawn Warlock of the Fiend
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water.
If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:

items.name: Forbiddance.
items.entry: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

items.name: Harmed by Running Water.
items.entry: The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

items.name: Stake to the Heart.
items.entry: The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a Bite attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, incapacitated, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

headerEntries: The vampire casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):

action.name: Summon Undead (1/Day)
entries: The vampire conjures {@filter undead creatures no higher than CR 5|bestiary|type=undead|challenge rating=[&0;&5]} and whose combined average hit points don't exceed 150. These undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of the vampire and obey its commands until they are destroyed, until it dismisses them as an action, or 8 hours have passed.

entries: The vampire has the following flaws:

items.name: Forbiddance.
items.entry: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

items.name: Harmed by Running Water.
items.entry: The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

items.name: Stake to the Heart.
items.entry: The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a Bite attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, incapacitated, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

reaction.name: Mantle of Majesty (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The vampire casts command, without expending a spell slot. For 1 minute or until its concentration ends (as if it were concentrating on a spell), it can cast command as a bonus action on each of its turns, without expending a spell slot. Any creature charmed by it automatically fails its saving throw against the command it casts with this feature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vampire casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

monster.name: Vampire Spawn Commander
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:

items.name: Forbiddance.
items.entry: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

items.name: Harmed by Running Water.
items.entry: The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

items.name: Stake to the Heart.
items.entry: The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes three attacks, only one of which can be a Bite attack.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, incapacitated, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of the vampire that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The vampire targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the vampire, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

reaction.name: Directed Strike (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the vampire can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, and the creature can hear the vampire, the vampire grants advantage to that roll.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ursinal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The ursinal can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the ursinal casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ursinal makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ursinal casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
entries: rWhen the kobold makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Kuraulyek's Tongue
entries: The kobold can communicate with ordinary bats and giant bats.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kobold makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and the kobold regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Command Bat
entries: The kobold targets one allied beast (bat types only) it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the kobold, the target can use its reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee attack.

bonus.name: Summon Bat (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The kobold summons {@dice 3d6} {@creature bat||bats}, 1 {@creature giant bat}, or 1 {@creature swarm of bats}. The bats appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the kobold and acts as its allies. The bats act right after the kobold on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They remain for 1 hour, until they or the kobold dies, or until the kobold dismisses them as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The kobold moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Javelin
entries: The kobold makes a Javelin attack.

legendary.name: Dagger (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kobold makes a Dagger attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fallen archon's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The fallen archon's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Corrupting Gaze
entries: Provided the fallen archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}, if a non-evil creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the fallen archon and the two of them can see each other, the fallen archon can force the creature to make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the fallen archon until the start of its next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature suffers the effect of the dominate monster spell without making a saving throw and treats all enemies of the fallen archon as its enemies. The fallen archon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the fallen archon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If it looks at the fallen archon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the fallen archon's Corrupting Gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The fallen archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes three Greatsword attacks, or makes one Greatsword attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The fallen archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tyrant archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}..

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes two Bite attacks and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 11d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Acid Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 +8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Acid Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes three Buisine attacks.

action.name: Buisine
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Herald's Call {@recharge 5}
entries: The archon plays its buisine to create a sound of utter clarity and piercing beauty. Each non-celestial creature within 120 feet that can hear the archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. A creature charmed in this way is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Herald's Call for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Buisine Blast (1/Day)
entries: The archon blows its buisine to emit a thunderous blast in a 60-foot cone that is audible 600 feet away. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. Creatures and objects made of glass or crystal have disadvantage on the saving throw and take 108 ({@damage 24d8}) thunder damage instead of 54 ({@damage 12d8}).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trumpet archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the revenant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another treant corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The revenant deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Vengeful Strikes
entries: If the target hit by the revenant's melee attack is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) weapon damage.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The revenant makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +11 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries: The revenant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the revenant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the revenant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the revenant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the tiktik can use its action to polymorph into its Fiend Form or back into its true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the tiktik appears as a hybrid humanoid vampire bat. Its statistics, other than its Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form at dawn or if it dies. While transformed, the tiktik also gains the following features.

items: The tiktik's creature type changes to fiend.
The tiktik has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the tiktik gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The tiktik can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
If the tiktik starts its turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, it becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The tiktik has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tiktik makes two attacks. two with its Dagger (humanoid form) or one with its Tongue and one with its Talons (fiend form).

action.name: Tongue (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the tiktik's tongue attaches to the target. While attached, the tiktik can't attack with its tongue. Instead, at the start of each of the tiktik's turns, the target loses 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) hit points and the tiktik gains temporary hit points equal to the amount of hit points lost by the target.
If the target is {@condition unconscious} and takes damage or loses hit points, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or fail to notice the attack.

The tiktik can detach its tongue by using a bonus action. It does so after it drains 15 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the tiktik's tongue.

action.name: Talons (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The tikbalang has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sarimanok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The tikbalang can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tikbalang makes three attacks: one Bite attack or Kick attack and two Claw attacks, or three Mane Spine attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@damage 1d10}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Mane Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute or until one spends an action to remove the spine.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The tikbalang covers itself and anything it is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes it look like another creature of Large size or smaller. The illusion ends if the tikbalang takes a bonus action to end it or if it dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the tikbalang could appear to have a regular humanoid face, but someone touching its face would feel its equine-shaped snout. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the tikbalang is disguised.

reaction.name: Rear Kick
entries: When a creature the tikbalang can see moves within 5 feet of it, the tikbalang can make one Kick attack against the creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tikbalang casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The tigbanua can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the tigbanua that starts its turn within 10 feet of the tigbanua must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, unless the tigbanua is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the tigbanua's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The tigbanua has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The tigbanua has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tigbanua's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tigbanua makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and if the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted by the {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} aswang curse. Casting {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The archon's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Penitentiary Gaze
entries: Provided the archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}, if a non-lawful good creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the archon and the two of them can see each other, the archon can force the creature to make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw if the archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature becomes wracked with guilt and filled with remorse over its life's actions that weren't lawful or good, and suffers an effect depending on its alignment.

LN or NG. The target suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the end of its next turn. The archon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.
CG, CN or N. Gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.
CE, NE, or LE. Gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} and take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) radiant damage.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the archon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If it looks at the archon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the archon's Penitentiary Gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: he archon makes three Greatsword attacks, or makes one Greatsword attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Suppress Magic {@recharge 5}

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 3}

action.name: Frightful Presence

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 3}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The thessaltrice has eight cockatrice heads. While it has more than one cockatrice head, the thessaltrice has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessaltrice takes 3 or more damage in a single turn, one of its cockatrice heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two cockatrice heads for each of its cockatrice heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessaltrice regains 3 hit points for each cockatrice head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessaltrice sleeps, at least one of its cockatrice heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessaltrice makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Cockatrice Bites, one with its Maw, and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Flurry of Cockatrice Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 +1}) piercing damage piercing damage for each cockatrice head it has, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessaltrice can't use its Tail Pincer tack on another target.

trait.name: Multiple Serpent Heads
entries: The thessalmera has eight serpent heads. While it has more than one serpent head, the thessalmera has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessalmera takes 5 or more damage in a single turn, one of its serpent heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalmera regains 5 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessalmera sleeps, at least one of its serpent heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessalmera makes four attacks: one with is Flurry of Serpent Bites, one with its Bite, one with its Claws, and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Flurry of Serpent Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage for each serpent head it has.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessalmera can't use its Tail Pincer attack on another target.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The thessalhydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Serpent Heads
entries: The thessalhydra has eight serpent heads. While it has more than one serpent head, the thessalhydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessalhydra takes 10 or more damage in a single turn, one of its serpent heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalhydra regains 10 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each serpent head the thessalhydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}. The thessalhydra can only use its Serpent Bite attack for these extra {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessalhydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessalhydra makes as many Serpent Bite attacks as it has serpent heads. It then makes two additional attacks. one with its Maw and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Serpent Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessalhydra can't use its Tail Pincer attack on another target.

action.name: Spit Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The thessalhydra spits a gob of acid at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Multiple Serpent Heads
entries: The thessalgorgon has eight serpent heads. While it has more than one serpent head, the thessalgorgon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessalgorgon takes 5 or more damage in a single turn, one of its serpent heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalgorgon regains 5 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessalgorgon sleeps, at least one of its serpent heads is awake.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the thessalgorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is prone, the thessalgorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessalgorgon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Serpent bites, one to Gore or with its Hooves, and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Flurry of Serpent Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage for each serpent head it has.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessalgorgon can't use its Tail Pincer attack on another target.

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The thessalgorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the tendriculos remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal mound of vegetation.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The tendriculos regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is touching at least 5-feet square of vegetation. This feature consumes the vegetation. If the tendriculos takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tendriculos's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tendriculos makes three melee attacks. two Tendril attacks and one Bite or Swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The tendriculos has two tendrils, each of which can grapple only one target. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 12; 20 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the tendriculos, which can grow a replacement tendril as an action.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tendriculos makes one Bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tendriculos, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the tendriculos's turns. A tendriculos can have up to four Small creatures, two Medium, or one Large creature swallowed at a time.

If the tendriculos takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the tendriculos must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tendriculos. If the tendriculos dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The tendriculos exhales poisonous splinters in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) piercing damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.
